section:
<para>This is some text.</para>
<section>
  <title>Subsection title</title>
  <para>Some text in the subsection</para>
</section>

<para>Start with some text, and then mix in some elements:
      <itemizedlist><listitem><para>Item numero uno</para></listitem><listitem><para>Item numero dos</para></listitem><listitem><para>Item three contains a list itself:</para><orderedlist><listitem><para>Oranges</para></listitem><listitem><para>Apples</para></listitem></orderedlist></listitem></itemizedlist>
      And then some text with <emphasis>emphasis</emphasis>
      following the list of items.
    </para>

<title>Test of sub and super scripts</title>
<para>Subscript: H<subscript>2</subscript>O</para>
<para>Superscript: y=x<superscript>3</superscript></para>
<para>Nested superscript: 
        y=x<superscript>3<superscript>4</superscript></superscript></para>
<para>Nested subscript: 
        x<subscript>3<subscript>4</subscript></subscript></para>
